website_summaries.verdict: The best value for your money. It's hard to find a more durable and versatile dog house in this price range.
pros: Easily holds dogs weighing up to 70 pounds
Assembly process is simple and quick
cons: Plastic door hinges have been known to fall off easily

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DOG HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house, fairly easly to assemble, you just line up the panels and snap it together. Don't worry about it feeling a little flimsy when you first unpack it, when it's put together it has adequate structural integrity. Our 45 pound dog loves it and she has plenty of room. And not a drop of water inside when we hosed it down. The roof unsnaps (you'll get better at this over time) for cleaning and blankie arranging.
customer_reviews.author: charter427

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Great purchase! I bought this size and extra large size, for each dog
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: CUTE AND MADE IN THE USA!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is for two feral cats who have adopted me. I'll be putting it in my garden shed (a converted detached garage) out of the harsh winter weather here in Ohio. The size is big enough for lots of straw to make this a cozy spot for them to be comfortable. I'm going to jig-saw a hole in the back for an escape door. It snapped together in less than 15 minutes - very clear instructions. The plastic will make Spring cleaning so easy - empty the straw and wash with warm, soapy water and rinse with the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy

customer_reviews.title: The doghouse was easy for my wife to assemble and is perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: The doghouse was easy for my wife to assemble and is perfect for my 13lb dog. I'm not sure how a 70lb dog could fit comfortably, but my dog has plenty of space to stretch! I haven't seen this product in the rain, but I believe it would probably do pretty well as it seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: The Ard's

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog house and it looks so nice! It was easy to assemble and I like that it comes with vinyl flap doors. I love the color of this house; it even matches our house! Very satisfied with this purchase and my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Verbena

customer_reviews.title: It's been about 3 months and my dog can easily get in and out of the house
customer_reviews.text: I don't think dogs should sleep outside, however my bf insisted on buying this house for our 6 month old puppy. He was tired of the peeing and pooping indoors so bought him this house to mainly sleep in during the night. It's been about 3 months and my dog can easily get in and out of the house. It was easy to build and my dog sleeps soundly every night. I did place his bed inside the house so that he didn't have to sleep on the plastic floor. So far so good!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: BIG MISTAKE!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. They continually came apart. Snapped back together a few times then had to duck tape it. That didn't work (see pics). At this point, anytime the dog set foot inside it didn't just come apart, it feel in a heap around him. Maybe if you took the time to glue each part as you snapped it together it would do better but at $60 each I did not get what I paid for. By the time I got fed up with it, it was dirty and cracked and I was too mad to pay shipping to send them back. If you want to try a snap together then buy it local so you can take it back.
customer_reviews.author: noel godwin

customer_reviews.title: Don't  buy if your dog is a chewer or part goat.
customer_reviews.text: It is a plastic snap together dog house. I thought it would be perfect for my pit-dalmatian mix. It was easy to assemble. It snapped together easily. The problem is, it didn't stand a chance with my chewaholic dog. She is also would jump on top and stand on the roof which caused the whole dog house to collapse. She weights 50 lbs. So needless to say this dog house was not a good fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Alma67

customer_reviews.title: Used with insulation, worked well
customer_reviews.text: On its own, this dog house was very cold and held little heat. BUT it's incredibly cute, and once I fixed it up with some Reflectix insulation and Gorilla tape, as well as a body heat-reflecting dog house pad, it worked awesomely. The dogs (we have one medium-sized dog and one small one) love it, and our kitten even likes it. Definitely big enough, as long as you don't plan on using it for a large dog. The dimensions listed seem to be correct.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M.

customer_reviews.title: Cathouse for Nebraska winters.....
customer_reviews.text: ******Update I bought this in September.....price has increased......I just purchased another from Chewy.com for $60.89 (sale price)....with free shipping************ It's a nice house for the money. It goes together easily and quickly. I will set this on a platform since there's no protection for the floor. I have lined the complete interior with an R-10 flat roof insulation...3 layers on the floor. I also use an electric warming mat.... I'm using the house for my outside cats. ******I was going to purchase another one of these houses.....but since the first week of September it has increased $30.00....it's a good thing this company doesn't sell gas when there's a shortage!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P.

customer_reviews.title: Forget about the dog
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida. With hurricanes . We all have back up generators for power outages. The generators must stay out side in a storm because they are gas powered . but they must be covered because of rain. So instead of building a covered tarp frame. ,Your large dog house is perfect.size . And waterproof. After the storm season is over, we just put the generator away with the dog house. Water proof and light weight makes this a 1 2 3 job and it's put way for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Albert's View

customer_reviews.title: More than a dog house!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these! One for the dog and one for the yard to serve as a cover for our well head! It's perfect for both applications. The dog loves his and with a solid black panel on the backside of the door, it made for a great way to stuff insulation inside and cover our well head out in the yard. It just looks like we have a dog house in the corner of the yard! Snapped together in minutes and it stays very dry inside for both applications.
customer_reviews.author: John Jowers

customer_reviews.title: Dog prefers it over $600 custom dog house
customer_reviews.text: I spent $600 building my dog an insulated, rain-proof, two room condo on wheels. She never used it. This one she uses. Go figure. I think it is because she like to stay close to the door. Felt this was a little but light and if the dog ran into it too fast, i could fall off the porch. Fixed it by adding a 2x2 on the edge of the porch to hold it in place. Set up was fun and easy. Dog is able to knock the panels losse sometimes, but overall, its a good buy for the money AND THE DOG USES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Flyin Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice item however we added insulated foam board to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice item however we added insulated foam board to the inside walls and roof and set them on top of an insulated frame.....works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Fraunfelter

customer_reviews.title: The roof didn't fit completely together and had some bends ...
customer_reviews.text: The roof didn't fit completely together and had some bends in it. Unfortunately, it rained so the box got ruined so I couldn't send it back. Due to the roof not fitting together the inside of the dog house got soaked. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 cats with room to spare.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for 2 stray cats that have made our back deck their home. I have 2 K&H heated mats  that fit perfectly in there and leaves them room if that mats are too warm for them or a place to put food. I like the fact that it is vented on the tops and the fact that the whole roof is removable for easy cleaning. I may do some insulating to make it a bit more cozy for them but them being dry and out of the wind will insure they will make it through yet another Wisconsin winter.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Teubert

customer_reviews.title: Hope the cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Maybe a little overpriced. Also a little flimsy, but we reinforced joints with calk. Made it a lot stronger. Ours is for stray cats. Makes a great home for them too. I won't tell them it's a dog house if you won't.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I felt ,it's not sturdy enough, but when I put everything together,it was fine. I would recommend to stake it, if you live in Windy City... Usually to assemble any product, I hire handyman,,,,this one I decided to try on my own...and snap snap snap...and it's done....it was sooooo easy..loved it.
customer_reviews.author: skyvinge

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the dog house especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the dog house especially for the price. I have 2 black labs and I already had one kennel, so I just needed one more kennel/ house. this house is plenty big for them ( not at the same time of course). It was easy to assemble and my biggest problem was getting the kids to stop playing in it so that I could take it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Oklahoma Review
customer_reviews.text: So where to start. I ordered this dog house because I'm not great in building things but have plans just not the skill. So we looked for months for dog house at lowes, petsmark could not find one we liked. So we said hey Amazon.... Looked for awhile then found this one. So we ordered it. Pros: Fast shipping Product correctly advertised Not cheap plastic Put together in 10min Hasn't blown away in April Oklahoma weather. Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: very good size dog house
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time, we reorder this... very good size dog house. The last set we ordered for our medium-large size 75lb dogs lasted about 3 years and were still in good condition but we figured for the price, it's time to get a new set for them. I recommend if you are going to use these for outside, attach a half inch plywood secured on 3 2x4 boards for extra height and to make sure your dogs are elevated a bit and warm.
customer_reviews.author: serineh harounian

customer_reviews.title: Beans my 1yr old mini pig loves his new house
customer_reviews.text: Perfect easy assembly better then I expected my mini pig loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I paid $35 total for this dog house, shipped to my house. From the size of the box, I would estimate that it would cost me that much to mail this to someone. How can anyone complain? From the timestamps on the photos, I am able to report that it took me 12 minutes to assemble. As you can see from the photos, it is a simple 1 layer plastic design that snaps into place. I don't imagine that it will provide a lot of warmth, but it will give my pet a place to get out of the weather while I am away at work.
customer_reviews.author: jp2code

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! The roof of the house was cracked and ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The roof of the house was cracked and the front of it seemed sort of used. I purchased a house with a brown roof and mine came to me with a gray roof. IF it were not such a hassLe to return it this would go back! Horrile and super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: oLiVe Tree

customer_reviews.title: This product was not very durable for my large pit/terrier ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was not very durable for my large pit/terrier mix. He basically ate the house... and tour it apart after it being outside for about a week and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Its like putting IKEA furnitures together. but only harder.
customer_reviews.text: The dog house is very nice. Good size, rigid, and my dog sure like it. However, putting it together was not as simple. I am very mechanical myself. The key is that you need to either be an octopus or have a third and fourth hand. I had trouble holding all four sides together, at the same time attaching the roof. God know how many times, it just fell open like a blooming onion. But it is a very nice dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Captain 777

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dog's
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my goat's I have 3 suncast sheds and love them. So figured I couldn't go wrong. They're easy to put together and the goat's are out of the weather. This one is huge, seen 4 pygmy goat's go in one.
customer_reviews.author: Suanne B.

customer_reviews.title: easiy to assemble.  Did it by myself without assistance.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together with simple instructions. The walls are a bit thin and I'm not sure how it will withstand a desert summer. We'll have to see it it's still standing after the sun and wind has it's way with it. So far it's stood up to 26mph winds without a problem (I did have to anchor the floor to a palette to keep it from blowing away).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog house!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog love's it and so do I.I should have gone with the small but at least he has plenty of room.It's water proof for sure also.I keep his on the porch because I never let him sleep in it at night.It's for when he want's his alone time and cat nap.It will keep the hot sun off him in the summer.And it was easy to put together just snaps together...
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Dog is afraid of it, but our toddler loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a spot for our pupper to keep cool so she would stop digging holes to lay in. She is a rescue and one of her previous owners kept her outside and lord only knows what else, but she's absolutely terrified of it. However, my 3-year-old won't stay out of it. It's one of his favorite places to play. It was a pain to put together, but it seems sturdy enough. Honestly, it was a waste of money for us, but not much to be done about that now.
customer_reviews.author: MsGingerSnapped

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble yet durable.
customer_reviews.text: First off it looks pretty cute it person. Most dog houses don't actually look like a "house". This is not an eye sore in my yard. Took 5 minutes, if that, to assemble. My German Shepherd fits nicely. She's also pretty hard on things and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: MsgrimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog because she kept sneaking over to the neighbor's dog house. I thought she might like it for when she got to play out back. It was easy to put together. Didn't feel super sturdy but has stood up to the rain and a couple of thunderstorms. It would have worked for my purposes. My goofy dog just didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: theirmom

customer_reviews.title: Good Size for Large Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a pointer and a lab, they both fit inside the dog house, this is a very good price for the quality you receive. Never regretted the purchase, and my dogs really like seem to like it. I like that it looks like a house too. You wont regret the purchase if you have a large dog and you are looking for comfort. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: fragrance4me

customer_reviews.title: Doghouse
customer_reviews.text: I will buy another one of these doghouse. I purchased 2 of these a few months ago. They come apart rather easy and I have to keep putting it back together. Not constructed very well. I have 3 other doghouse that are ingloos. They are well constructed and hold up well. Worth the extra money. I've had them well over a year and used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jean J. Dolder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised; perfect for feral cats
customer_reviews.text: It says it would fit a large dog but idk about that. I think it would be cramped for a big dog. But it's great for what I wanted it for which is to house feral cats. It's sturdy and doesn't leak and the flaps on the door keep the rain out. I would recommend putting it on a pallet of wood because the entrance is flush with the ground so it could potentially flood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: It was nice when my dogs was 2 months but now since he is 10 months and 70 pounds he pretty much broken it down to its original pieces smh . Yea it easy to snap it back in place but my dog just tears it up again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best construction but workable.
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely not the heaviest in construction, but a little glue handled that. The fact that they are not insulated, and pretty much just a plastic shell that is snapped together, makes them fairly easy to move. They are good for my use which is on a covered porch. It gives them enough shelter from the wind and blowing rain.
customer_reviews.author: Old_Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house for my purposes. Used it to replace the unsightly dog crate in my room- so it will not be used outsides. Assembled in about 5 minutes (without the flaps). Material is thin, but no concerns with sturdiness. I assembled it and then carried it upstairs without any issues/ any parts coming apart. No tools required for assembly and plenty big enough for my 45 pound pooch. She used it last night and seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good dog house - good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good dog house. Kinda hard to snap together, but got it done. Nice house. This is the second one ordered. I split my time between 2 places and I have one house at each place. With a heating pad she can use it even in 40 degree weather. Nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dok

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to assemble dog house.
customer_reviews.text: This dog house looks nice and is easy to assemble. Most importantly my two dogs both pile in when it starts to rain! It took them a few weeks to trust this new item in their environment. Placing their full dog bowls in the the house overcame that reluctance. You could build a dog house from wood, etc, but it would cost you double the price of this one in materials and labor.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Barshinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is exactly what we were looking for. It arrived earlier than projected and was in perfect condition when we opened the box. With the snap-together (no tools) assembly, it took maybe 10-15 minutes to put together. It looks good and is plenty sturdy. Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend as primary shelter or for a dog over 10 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for any animal if any size as if could easily be knocked apart by anything over 10-20 lbs. Very thin walls and very flimsy. Frankly if I was using it for a dog or if I wasn't using it under a cover I would return it
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cone

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, shelter for pet.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great quality. It wasn't fun to put it together, having help is advised, but is big enough for in my case a cat with small cat condo and food station. One of my indoor cats is being bad and I have to put her out in my back yard, now I don't feel guilty, that house will provide to her the shelter she will need for the elements, big enough for cat condo, bed, food station, situated next to my back door, I'll know she will be ok, while not having to endure any more cat pee in the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: D. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise house
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together. But I put together inside house and couldn't get thru sliding door had to go out front door. Using for tortoise not dog. Have it on cover patio area, tortoise seems to like it, I threw dirt on the bottom and replace the clear plastic door with a green plastic mesh material which tortoise likes better to be in dark. Not sure how long it would last out in Arizona sun, that's why I put under patio.
customer_reviews.author: Regina C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love rhe house. I have one inside, for the really scared one, and one outside for the slightly, new stray baby. I love the simple assembly and I am in Florida...so I make sure the house is in the shade, and voilá here we go
customer_reviews.author: manuelapknopp

customer_reviews.title: Like a playhouse for pets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our porch cats and they love to huddle in it. Cats actually like an escape route and two entrances but they still seem to like this one. They are in a screen enclosure and don't have predators. It seems nice and warm and water tight if you need to use outside for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: FLDEB

customer_reviews.title: The box looked like it had been half destroyed when it was delivered ...
customer_reviews.text: size, shape and color are as expected. The box looked like it had been half destroyed when it was delivered to my home. My dog is about 25lbs so there is enough room for his bed in the back and blanket for treats on the front. It is kind of flimsy when putting it together. The roof doesn't perfectly align so it looks a little weird on the spine. I like the plastic flaps but they terrify my dog lol I only put one on and he was fine with that. Its a great dog house for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Dog house
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together.we have a lab and boxer and blue healer they seem to like them. But you need to fasten it to something solid bigger dogs can move it around pretty easy
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is being used as an outdoor kitty litter, and it's great! Cats began using it right away, and it's big enough to store the bag of litter as well as the litter box. I didn't attach the roof, just laid it on top, and it looks good and is easy to remove to clean the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am HIGHLY disappointed in the quality, or lack thereof, for the price of this dog house. This is the flimsiest, thinnest plastic! My plastic Tupperware is thicker than this dog house. Don't waste your money, there are other higher quality dog houses that are very similar in price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk.
customer_reviews.text: These doguys houses are trash. You would think the 3 little pigs built/designed them. Everyday I have to rebuild them. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Clements

customer_reviews.title: We like the product, the dog is very happy too.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived sooner than expected. Put it together easily. Instructions were clear. My wife used two blankets (the kind used to protect furniture when moving) as insulation for the floor and inside walls before clicking the top (roof) to the dog house, which helped on keeping the blanket in place. They will be removed for summertime. We are very satisfied with the purchase and the price. The dog is also very happy in his new residence.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this dog house to put in our dog kennel to shelter our two boys from the weather! Our dogs are always laying together/cuddling and one dog house is perfect for them. It is a little tight if whichever is in the back needs to get out - but they love it. We a few blankets in there and also thin foam insulation to help with the crazy Utah weather! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Peeps

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, have two, but my lab and my sons lab 10 mos old, 80# almost destroyed them. I caught them in the frenzy of doing so and had to reinforce them with bolts and nuts(dog houses I mean). But they are too stupid to go in them to get out of the rain, they just run in and out playing!!
customer_reviews.author: Don G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipped fast!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a cheap dog house for the side yard, and this is perfect. It seemed a little flimsy when we opened the box, and it was a little difficult to assemble, but it works great. It's good size too, our 35 lb dog can fit in there with her blanket, food and water bowl (we put them inside the house when it's raining out).
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy/indoor/outdoor/spacious dog house
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product all around! I was very surprised on how big it is and still fits in a box that is easy to take on the go. It’s easy to put together, keep clean and can be used indoor or outdoor. My full size pit bull fits in this comfortably. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Thin cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two doghouses. They are made of a thin plastic. It was not complicated to assemble. Looks nice from the outside. I am concerned that the plastic will be brittle in cold temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly simple to assemble. It didn't stay 'up/put together' very long. All it takes is a strong animal and the thing will fall apart. The bottom is completely off and so is one of the sides.
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Super Easy assembly, As described
customer_reviews.text: Great Price, Super Easy assembly, As described. Very happy with purchase!! My dog loves her 'hiding' place. Suggest to buy a low profile mat for inside for comfort and so it doesn't get caught on the plastic door flaps - I had to get a thinner mat than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rose Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but has a very small problem
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this house, he is always sleeping in there. I got it because it was getting colder outside and he is an older dog and he needs to be kept warm. It's very simple to put together, very easy to clean. The only small issue I have is that the flaps bend and warp from him going in and out all the time, so that lets in the cold wind and air. The warp goes away when I wash the flaps, but I am not able to wash them every single day, as my job keeps me very busy and away from home a lot. Overall I am very pleased with this dog house though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like returning anything, but this had to go back. Not very well made~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good house.
customer_reviews.text: The house was very easy to put together. It would be easier with two people, but I did it alone. The clear door is a bit reflective which freaked my dog out initially. But with training she moved past it and uses the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: This dog house was inexpensive and easy to put together. It will protect your dog from wind and rain. However, it does nothing against cold, since there is no insulation whatsoever. Maybe it wasn't meant to be used in cold weather, but in my opinion, a dog house should have at least some sort of insulation.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest thing in the world, but gets the job done. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: 21MJB24

customer_reviews.title: Thin walls but a great inexpensive dog house
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed by the very thin walls. It takes two people to assemble. But its been over two months and no problems at all. For our little dogs it work fine. I do not use the plastic clear vinyl door.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Boutin

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at. Kinda too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cute and clean. Too lightweight, has tipped over in the wind. Perfect size for my husky. I got it because it rains a lot here. The plastic doors should help worh that but so far ... my dog hasn't actually gotten in it :) but, I like to know that he could.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: The feral cats have loved it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and put a weight-activated warming pillow in it for the two spayed female feral cats that call our backyard their home. We put it right up near the house, plugged in the pillow and within two days they overcame their apprehension and moved right in. It has really improved their comfort and security as outside feral cats. Highly recommended if you live in a cold climate and care about the feral cats. There's probably room for two more adult cats if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but not so durable
customer_reviews.text: Feels like Tupperware or Rubbermaid!! Ha! But my dog who is roughly 45 lbs and a pit mix medium build loves it. It’s def too big for him but coming from a shelter, he’s in heaven with this mansion! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Analicia Ledesma Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Need a better design for the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading instructions and watching a Youtube video, still couldn't get the floor to connect together properly. Luckily the walls, and roof are holding the dog house together. Placed under a deck to keep my female border collie dry when it rains. She refuses to come in from the rain, so this should help.
customer_reviews.author: bcolliemom

customer_reviews.title: Not good for 75+ lb. dogs (or mine anyway)
customer_reviews.text: I have two large dogs, or so I thought. They must be extra large because they busted he walls out of these dog houses. Not bad quality material, but I definitely needed a bigger size. After they squeezed themselves into the houses and popped the sides out, they were not repairable. In total the houses lasted about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Read a few bad reviews and purchased anyway. Works good for us! Easy to put together and sturdy enough to keep my dogs warm. It's bigger than I expected. Fits my 2 girls perfectly, they have tons of extra space! (I extra small chihuahua & 1 chihuahua mix) ordering another one for my othee medium sized dog as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Doggie She Shed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend's dog. It's perfect! Keeps out cold wind and rain when an unpredicted storm moves in. Keeps their dog dry and warm until they arrive home from work 😉
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly , very easy to clean and reassemble. My Shepherd didn't care for the plastic entry covers. So I removed them. If you have a dog bigger than a shepherd buy the x large house.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great size doghouse
customer_reviews.text: I love my doghouse and most importantly so does my dog. He stays in his house like he never wants to leave. Plus i love the little hang down doors. I didnt even know that it came with them. Easy set up. Took less than five minutes total Size is bigger than I expected. Will be ordering another for my other dog. My seventeen year old son fits inside with no problems lol...
customer_reviews.author: Pretti Weirdo Davis

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love the house- I have mounted them on plywood on ...
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love the house- I have mounted them on plywood on a pallet to keep the floor secure we screwed it down to plywood. One of my girls climbs on it and we had to so some supporting with 2x4's on all 4 sides to keep her from destroying it- but a great value and love the ease to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eon Farms

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: With the winter cold coming, my husband brought home a dog that initially would stay inside at night, unfortunately he likes to pee in the house. This was perfect for him to sleep in on the porch. He's a chocolate lab and fits in it with room for a 4 year old and 1 year old to get in with him. The dog uses it and I don't feel as bad for kicking him out now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the door flaps was much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for two outdoor cats. The quality of the door flaps was much better than expected. This house holds so much of their body heat that the clear flaps steam up on the inside. This is big enough for 3 cats or maybe 4 small cats. My two cats have room to spare. I purchased a self warming bed to put in it and they stay warm and dry in this house. Good value for the money for sure. The roof is a green color.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haskett

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to put cat little box in outside in pool area... perfect
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and easy access to the interior to clean. I also like the pitched roof which is important when it rains. I used this to store our cat litter box in the pool area (cats get out there through a cat door - so we don't have the stinks in the house). Put this together in like 10 mins and despite being snap together it's sturdy (doesn't feel like it would be as you start putting it together... but once your done it seems to really solidify.
customer_reviews.author: AlexC

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this house for outside cats (strays but not) so they had some shelter from the rain and cold and so far it works great. We do need to stake down and would have been great if they were included. We like the plastic material because its easy to clean and won't rot or get ruined from the weather. We live in FL so we shall see if the sun fades it and how it lasts. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dog house for german shep
customer_reviews.text: got this for 9 week old german shepherd , very easy to put together, not the sturdiest and I will have it in a kennel so should be good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was packaged great. My dogs love them and it was very ...
customer_reviews.text: Was packaged great. My dogs love them and it was very easy to assemble. Very light and does not take up much room. The only issue I saw was that one of the screws on the flaps will not tighten and will occasionally come off.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog house.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a summer dog house. When winter comes I will put one of those outdoor pet heating pads in it. The house looks nice and complements my yard.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.  Lightweight.  Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. And disassemble. First gust of wind and both houses collapsed. Utterly useless for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall & Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got it within a day. Easy to put together. Took me 10 mins. The roof seems like it would leak in a rain storm but we can easily proof it :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My dog and cat like it
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small pet houses side by side inside. The dog’s has a small heating pad. Works for them. Setup was easy. Everything snaps together quickly. I only installed one storm flap. .
customer_reviews.author: DW Dawg

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how easy is to assemble. Sturdiness not so great but still in good shape; and I don't have any trouble to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It is not the same colors as it shows and its thin plastic it did not come with the studs to put the door on so over all not very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Howard Yates

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: For being a very lightweight and inexpensive dog house, it has lasted me a whole year and looks just as new. It's gone through rain, wind and hail and has still managed to be just as durable. I removed the clear door flaps because my dogs weren't too fond of it, other than that it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Layla M.

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my 3 ferel cats in mind although it's actually for dogs. Since they've been babies and they're mother got killed, they've lived under our front deck so I bought this hoping they would take to it. They didn't use it at all but that's okay. For anyone with a medium sized dog, this would be a great little house. It's really easy to put together since it kind of snaps together. It's basically a Little Tyke house for dogs. I'm 5'4 and I actually crawled inside it just to see how roomy it was and it's quite roomy enough for a pooch.
customer_reviews.author: HDSpringerLady

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this is a great dog house..very easy to assemble and looks great. i have a 75 pitbull and it has plenty of room inside for her
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Doudney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his house. It is very stylish, durable, and cozy enouugh for him in winter time!!!!! Very highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, and is perfect for my two Jack Russell/Chihuahua mixes. They really didn't go in it much when I had the 2 vinyl covers on the door, but once I removed them (which is super easy to do), they go in their house all the time.
customer_reviews.author: aella8

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor pets to stay dry!
customer_reviews.text: Three stray kittens landed in my backyard and I have been taking care of them and now they are basically my outdoor cats. That being said, with winter and rain I was worried about them staying dry. I bought this and put food in it and they love it! The flaps help keep them insulated and water does not get inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price! My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly dog. He is about 16 lbs medium sized dog. If your dog is any bigger he might not be able to lay inside comfortably. The material is good. With a big comforter inside and maybe some insulation it should be warm enough for the winter. I've had it for a couple months now and my dog sleeps in it every night! He loves it! Definitely recommend. For the price, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Snow

customer_reviews.title: At least the dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: I guess you can say "you get what you paid for". We had to gorilla glue the pieces of this house together otherwise it wasn't going to stand or stay together. It's extremely flimsy! Nonetheless I gave it 2 stars because at least the dog has been using it. However, I definitely will be looking for a better house in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Houses
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one ordered. Extremely easy to assemble and sturdy enough for my large German Shepherd’s
customer_reviews.author: W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: super great dog house!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together but not insulated good will have to put a heat lamp in like I did for the winter
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together and our dog loves it to get out of the sun. Wished it had some screened vented spots that we could slide open to let a breeze in or close in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: HappiKampers

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this. I actually did and it has missing parts. The manufacturer does not answer their phone.You get a recording.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the size
customer_reviews.text: We had been looking around for a dog house for our mini Aussie mix. This was perfect As it is larger then we thought it would be, he can have his food and bed in there and the birds don't get to it. It was very easy to put together, no written instructions, just pictures but pretty self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: R.Vining

product_meta.title: Suncast Outdoor Dog House with Door - Water Resistant and Attractive for Small to Large Sized Dogs - Easy to Assemble - Perfect for Backyards
product_meta.description: The Suncast outdoor dog house is an attractive backyard solution for your pets, Both small and large (measures 35" X 27" X 29.5"). the modern design is fashioned to complement the furniture and decor of your patio or backyard. Built with hardened plastic that resists fading, rust and rot, the kennel's attractive appearance will last in even the toughest outdoor conditions. The durable resin is strong and sturdy, and the components snap together with ease without the need for tools making assembly a breeze. Also includes a vinyl door for additional protection from the weather and other animals, and letters for you to personalize with your dog's name.
feature_bullets: Outdoor dog house: attractive dog house for pets up to 70 pounds is perfect for your backyard, patio and deck
Durable: constructed from heavy-duty resin with a crowned floor to keep your pet safe from all weather elements
Hassle FREE assembly: dog house snaps together with ease, so your pet can enjoy their new home right away
Good-looking: the contemporary house design matches most outdoor décor, and it resists fading and washes easily for years of quality use
Door included: vinyl door (Measures 11.75" X 20.5") provides additional security and insulation for your pet without obstructing entry or exit

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
